name: Carlos Rewind
description:
In this game you play as a man named carlo who sells his soul to the devil! Now you have to play the game in rewind and instead of your abilities upgrading they downgrade.

DO NOT INLARGE SIZE GAME BREAKS!!!

Special thanks to Dragon tamer 1650 for making the music and Evelier Locket for the voice acting

Check out Evelier Locket here: https://www.twitch.tv/evelierlocket
